text:
I am, thank you Nana, hope your enjoying your time off as well :smiley:
Composition is important for sure, it's part of one of the 12 principles of animation: "Staging".

When I make an animation exercise or when im working on my shot, it's something I think about. If the action is reading well through the camera and if theres anything I can tweak to improve.
Do you know some of the base ideas, like rule of thirds and focal points?
